results.overview: Failed London banker Max Skinner inherits his uncle's vineyard in Provence, where he spent many childhood holidays. Upon his arrival, he meets a woman from California who tells Max she is his long-lost cousin and that the property is hers.
results.title: A Good Year

results.overview: Bruno and Amanda have to face the difficulties of a long distance relationship after meeting in a flight forced into an emergency landing.
results.title: Air Bridge

results.overview: At the start of the First World War, in the middle of Africa’s nowhere, a gin soaked riverboat captain is persuaded by a strong-willed missionary to go down river and face-off a German warship.
results.title: The African Queen

results.overview: Police officers at a station must solve a murder case.
results.title: Keep an Eye Out

results.overview: In a futuristic city, the residents have lost their voices to both the omnipotent Mr. TV and the nameless corporation that runs the metropolis.
results.title: The Aerial

results.overview: Sylvia's work increasingly takes her away from the three men who help bring up Mary, her daughter. When she decides to move to England and take Mary with her, the three men are heartbroken at losing the two most important females in their lives.
results.title: 3 Men and a Little Lady

results.overview: When Vetter's wife is killed in a botched hit organized by Diablo, he seeks revenge against those responsible. But in the process, Vetter and Hicks have to fight their way up the chain to get to Diablo but it's easier said than done when all Vetter can focus on is revenge.
results.title: A Man Apart

results.overview: Now irrelevant in this 2.0 company, Jean-Claude is fired! Hervé is charged by the management to make Jean-Claude clear off quickly and without a scene. In doing so, they will tear down their memories, mixing the great and the small history of the past 20 years. Over the course of these memories, Hervé and Jean-Claude will renew the bonds of a lost friendship.
results.title: Already 20 years of Caméra Café

results.original_title: ギニーピッグ2 血肉の華
results.overview: Late at night, a woman is kidnapped by an unknown assailant and taken back to his blood-spattered dungeon, where he turns her into a "flower of blood and flesh" through a series of dismemberment and evisceration.
results.title: Guinea Pig Part 2: Flower of Flesh and Blood

results.overview: During the 1972 elections, two reporters' investigation sheds light on the controversial Watergate scandal that compels President Nixon to resign from his post.
results.title: All the President's Men

results.overview: This documentary follows NBA superstar LeBron James and four of his talented teammates through the trials and tribulations of high school basketball in Ohio and James' journey to fame.
results.title: More than a Game

results.overview: Quiet, kindhearted introvert Marcie has lots of brilliant ideas to help her friends achieve goals and solve problems. But when the world takes notice and the spotlight lands on her, sharing those ideas becomes a challenge.
results.title: Snoopy Presents: One-of-a-Kind Marcie

results.overview: A police inspector is called to Milan to investigate a murder case since he grew up in the same ghetto as the suspect.
results.title: Crime at Porta Romana

results.overview: The third and final instalment in the Burnout trilogy. This time, the road leads through Norway, to Sweden, Denmark and finally Germany to race on the famous racing track, Nürburgring.
results.title: Asphalt Burning

results.overview: The summer before college, Auden meets the mysterious Eli, a fellow insomniac. While the seaside town of Colby sleeps, the two embark on nightly quests to help Auden experience the fun, carefree teen life she never knew she wanted.
results.title: Along for the Ride

results.overview: The story of Javier who, at the age of 16, while kissing a girl for the first time, realized that he had a gift of romantic clairvoyance. Javier can see the future... and he finally knows who the love of his life is.
results.title: Love at First Kiss

results.overview: The Boyle family moves into a gothic style house by a cemetery, unaware of its bloody path and guts-spraying future.
results.title: The House by the Cemetery

results.overview: A couple get into an argument at their cocktail party that escalates until it brings an abrupt end to the festivities. They and their guests decide to re-create the entire night again and again to determine who was right.
results.title: The Argument

results.original_title: The Girl with All the Gifts
results.overview: In the future, a strange fungus has changed nearly everyone into thoughtless, flesh-eating monsters. When a scientist and a teacher find a girl who seems to be immune to the fungus, they all begin a journey to save humanity.
results.title: The Girl with All the Gifts

results.overview: Aided by his horse, Percy, Goofy takes horsemanship to a new level.
results.title: How to Ride a Horse
